verses.text: \w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* purposed \w to|strong="H5921"\w* build \w a|strong="H3068"\w* house \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* house \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* kingdom.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* counted \w out|strong="H7971"\w* threescore \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w ten|strong="H1732"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w bear|strong="H6213"\w* burdens, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* fourscore thousand \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w were|strong="H1732"\w* hewers \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* mountains, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* three thousand \w and|strong="H7971"\w* six hundred \w to|strong="H7971"\w* oversee \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* Solomon \w sent|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Huram \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Tyre, saying, \w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* didst deal \w with|strong="H1004"\w* David \w my|strong="H3068"\w* father, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* didst send \w him|strong="H6440"\w* cedars \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* dwell therein, \add even so deal with me\add*.

Behold, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God, \w to|strong="H1004"\w* dedicate \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* burn before \w him|strong="H3605"\w* incense \w of|strong="H1004"\w* sweet spices, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* continual showbread, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* burnt-offerings morning \w and|strong="H1419"\w* evening, \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sabbaths, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* new moons, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w set|strong="H1129"\w* feasts \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God. \w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \add an ordinance\add* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w to|strong="H1004"\w* Israel.

\w And|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w which|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w great|strong="H6440"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w above|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* gods.

\w But|strong="H6258"\w* \w who|strong="H3063"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* able \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w build|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* house, seeing heaven \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* heaven \w of|strong="H6213"\w* heavens \w cannot|strong="H3045"\w* contain \w him|strong="H7971"\w*? \w who|strong="H3063"\w* am \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w then|strong="H6258"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w should|strong="H6213"\w* \w build|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* house, save only \w to|strong="H7971"\w* burn incense \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*?

\w Now|strong="H2009"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w skilful|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* work \w in|strong="H5650"\w* gold, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* silver, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* brass, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* iron, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* purple, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* crimson, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* blue, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* grave \add all manner of\add* gravings, \add to be\add* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w skilful|strong="H3045"\w* \w men|strong="H5650"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5650"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* Judah \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* Jerusalem, \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w David|strong="H5973"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* father \w did|strong="H5650"\w* provide.

Send \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* cedar-trees, fir-trees, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* algum-trees, \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Lebanon; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* know \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thy|strong="H3559"\w* servants know \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* cut \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* Lebanon. \w And|strong="H1419"\w*, behold, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* servants \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H6086"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H3559"\w* servants,

even \w to|strong="H5414"\w* prepare \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* abundance; \w for|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* house \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* am \w about|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* build \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* great \w and|strong="H6242"\w* wonderful.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w*, behold, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* servants, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hewers \w that|strong="H5971"\w* cut timber, twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* beaten wheat, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* barley, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* twenty thousand baths \w of|strong="H4428"\w* wine, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* twenty thousand baths \w of|strong="H4428"\w* oil.

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Tyre answered \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w writing|strong="H6213"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Solomon, \w Because|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* loveth \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Huram|strong="H2361"\w* said moreover, Blessed \w be|strong="H6258"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* Israel, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H7971"\w* earth, \w who|strong="H3045"\w* \w hath|strong="H3045"\w* given \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w David|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* king \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H2450"\w*, \w endued|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* discretion \w and|strong="H7971"\w* understanding, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w should|strong="H2450"\w* build \w a|strong="H3068"\w* house \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* house \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* kingdom.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w now|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w skilful|strong="H3045"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w*, \w endued|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* understanding, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Huram \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*â€™s,

\w the|strong="H7971"\w* son \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H5650"\w* Dan; \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* father \w was|strong="H5650"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w of|strong="H5650"\w* Tyre, skilful \w to|strong="H7971"\w* work \w in|strong="H5650"\w* gold, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* silver, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* brass, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* iron, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* stone, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* timber, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* purple, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* blue, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* fine linen, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* crimson, also \w to|strong="H7971"\w* grave any manner \w of|strong="H5650"\w* graving, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* devise any device; \w that|strong="H8081"\w* \w there|strong="H6258"\w* \w may|strong="H3196"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* \add a place\add* appointed \w unto|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w thy|strong="H7971"\w* skilful \w men|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* skilful \w men|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* lord \w David|strong="H7971"\w* \w thy|strong="H7971"\w* father.

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wheat \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* barley, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oil \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wine, \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w hath|strong="H3389"\w* spoken \w of|strong="H4480"\w*, let \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w send|strong="H5927"\w* \w unto|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* servants:

\w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w cut|strong="H3478"\w* wood \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Lebanon, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w much|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3605"\w* thou shalt need; \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H1732"\w* \w it|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w thee|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* floats \w by|strong="H3478"\w* sea \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Joppa; \w and|strong="H3967"\w* thou shalt carry \w it|strong="H4672"\w* \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Jerusalem.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* Solomon \w numbered|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* sojourners \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*, \w after|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* numbering wherewith David \w his|strong="H6213"\w* father \w had|strong="H5971"\w* \w numbered|strong="H3967"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*; \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* found \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* fifty thousand \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* thousand \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.
And he set threescore and ten thousand of them to bear burdens, and fourscore thousand that were hewers in the mountains, and three thousand and six hundred overseers to set the people at work.
